WRITING.TEXT: I don't believe that in the least. That a fantasy certain people came up with to sell books or promote their websites.

Some people believe that there was contact between mainland Asia and the people's of pre-Columbia South America. Could this be disproved by the fact that the indigenous peoples of pre-Columbia society did not have smallpox until the Spaniards came?
